last_episode_to_air.name: Shaman King: God End
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hao releases the might of his newly acquired powers against Yoh and the others, but the scrappy crew refuses to give up hope.

name: SHAMAN KING
overview: Medium Yoh Asakura enters a battle tournament held every 500 years, competing with other shamans in a bid to become the all-powerful Shaman King.

episodes.name: The Man Who Dances with Ghosts
episodes.overview: Shaman Yoh Asakura offers to help his new classmate Manta face a notorious thug with the aid of a legendary samurai spirit.

episodes.name: Another Shaman
episodes.overview: Yoh and Manta encounter the shaman Ren, who shows no mercy when fighting a punk. Furious at Ren’s misuse of his powers, Yoh faces him in battle.

episodes.name: Anna and Tao Jun
episodes.overview: Anna tells Yoh about the new tournament to crown the next Shaman King. Ren's sister Jun challenges Yoh to a battle, with Amidamaru as the prize.

episodes.name: Happy Place
episodes.overview: After possessing Ryu, Tokageroh takes Manta hostage. Yoh and Amidamaru fight him, but Tokageroh wields Harusame and they're at a disadvantage.

episodes.name: Over Soul
episodes.overview: One of the Patch Officiants, Silva, unleashes his five animal spirits against Yoh to determine if he's worthy of participating in the Shaman Fight.

episodes.name: Yoh vs. Horohoro!
episodes.overview: Now qualified for the tournament, Yoh faces his first opponent, Horohoro of Hokkaido, a proud Ainu shaman who can manipulate ice and snow.

episodes.name: A Form of Courage
episodes.overview: Faust VIII, a necromancer who can manipulate corpses, enrages Yoh when he targets Manta for sadistic experimentation before their match.

episodes.name: Progress
episodes.overview: With Ren as his next opponent, Yoh distances himself from Manta to ensure his friend's safety. Later, Yoh returns to Izumo to continue his training.

episodes.name: Yoh vs. Ren: Again!
episodes.overview: The last battle in the preliminary round begins. Fated rivals Yoh and Ren fight to the limit, but who will punch their ticket to the main tournament?

episodes.name: Night in the Flame
episodes.overview: Ren returns to China to take care of unfinished business. The BōZ Brothers ambush Yoh and Tamao, but a familiar face comes to their rescue.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Men
episodes.overview: Back home, an imprisoned Ren vows to defeat his father after losing to him in a fight. Meanwhile, Yoh and the others set out for China to rescue Ren.

episodes.name: Ren vs. En: The End of the Tao
episodes.overview: Ren and his allies make their way toward En. The head of the Tao family may be a formidable foe, but Yoh and company aren't ones to back down.

episodes.name: And Hao!
episodes.overview: Yoh’s group meets the self-proclaimed future king. Those in the main tournament board a flight, not knowing their first trial is about to begin.

episodes.name: Lyserg the Avenger
episodes.overview: As Yoh and the others prepare to travel to a town where a Patch Tribe village once stood, the dowser Lyserg appears and asks to join their group.

episodes.name: When the Pieces Come Together
episodes.overview: Yohmei tasks Anna with delivering an ancient book belonging to the Asakura family to Yoh in the United States. Horohoro’s guardian Kororo goes missing.

episodes.name: Enter the Ultra-Pompandour
episodes.overview: Searching for answers, Yoh and company arrive at the ancestral village of the Patch Tribe, where they find themselves beset by Hao’s followers.

episodes.name: Guns of the Angels
episodes.overview: Facing Boris, Ryu unleashes a new power acquired from his training with Yoh's grandfather Yohmei. An unexpected person appears before Manta and Anna.

episodes.name: Great Spirits and My Team
episodes.overview: Yoh's group reaches the Patch Tribe Village as they find the Great Spirits and learn the purpose of the Shaman Fight. A cheery shaman joins the team.

episodes.name: Jaguar
episodes.overview: While looking for Lyserg, Yoh and friends are confronted by Faust, who makes a startling offer. Finally the stage is set, and the Shaman Fight begins.

episodes.name: Joco’s Christmas
episodes.overview: Team Ren faces off against Hao's lackeys, Team Tsuchi-gumi. Joco recalls his past with a certain person after being cornered in a desperate situation.

episodes.name: Iron Maiden Jeanne
episodes.overview: The second Shaman Fight begins as Team X-I of the X-Laws take on Egypt's Team Niles. But X-I's newest member is someone Yoh's group knows all too well.

episodes.name: I'll Go Anywhere with You
episodes.overview: Team Funbari Hot Springs begins their first match versus the Icemen. But Yoh vows to defeat them with one attack thanks to the ultra senji ryakketsu.

episodes.name: The Power of Yoh
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by Faust's new Over Soul, the Icemen crumble under the pressure — then launch a sub-zero counterattack as the end of the match approaches.

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: Yoh meets with Lyserg for a long-awaited conversation, but others lurking nearby intervene. Finally, X-Laws' team X-III takes on Hao's Hoshi-gumi team.

episodes.name: The Great Onmyoji, Hao Asakura
episodes.overview: Yoh watches helplessly as Team X-III desperately fights Hao, who reveals the secret of his birth and his thousand-year history with the Asakura clan.

episodes.name: Mikihisa Typhoon
episodes.overview: Yoh's friends are stunned by the revelation about Hao. Later, a mysterious masked man appears before Team Ren with an offer to make them stronger.

episodes.name: Farewell Forever
episodes.overview: Ren gains new power after taking on his powerful opponent. As the Shaman Fight continues, Hao's followers begin targeting teams outside the ring.

episodes.name: What Yoh Decided
episodes.overview: Horohoro and Joco try to escape Hao's follower Peyote Díaz with an injured Ren, but Yoh makes a surprising entrance. Elsewhere, Anna makes her move.

episodes.name: Emeth
episodes.overview: As Anna helps Mikihisa's teammates escape to their Shaman Fight, Tamao and Jun's battle against Hao's Hana-gumi heats up.

episodes.name: Mt. Osore Le Voile
episodes.overview: Yoh accepts Jeanne's conditions as payment for healing Ren, leaving their friends in shock. Anna recalls the first time she met Yoh five years ago.

episodes.name: Mt. Osore Le Voile II
episodes.overview: Yoh tries to understand his fiancée, who continues to reject him and her connection to the demon attacking the town. Matamune's past is revealed.

episodes.name: Mt. Osore Le Voile III
episodes.overview: Bit by bit, Anna and Yoh get closer when they visit the shrine together for New Year's. But Anna's powers bring on a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Mt. Osore Le Voile IV
episodes.overview: Yoh and Matamune arrive at Mt. Osorezan to rescue Anna from the giant demon born from people's hearts, but Yoh only has one shot to save her.

episodes.name: To Be King
episodes.overview: Yoh's path to being Shaman King is over. Ryu and Manta spy on Jeanne's successful resurrection of Ren, which has an unexpectedly powerful side effect.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Horohoro finishes the fight with Brocken's team. Lyserg brings an injured Horohoro to Yoh's team when Peyote attacks with the intent to kill.

episodes.name: Redseb and Seyrarm
episodes.overview: Mikihisa’s teammates, siblings Ludsev and Seyram, seek revenge against the person who killed their father. But Yoh steps in before it’s too late.

episodes.name: Winds of Laughter
episodes.overview: Golem’s new user goes on a rampage while Ren, Ludsev and the others come up with a plan to bring them back to their senses. Hao gives Opacho a task.

episodes.name: Graduation
episodes.overview: Opacho appears in front of Yoh with a message: Yoh must return to the Shaman Fight or Hao will destroy Golem and the children. What will he decide?

episodes.name: The Summit
episodes.overview: Yoh’s battle with X-Laws to re-enter the Shaman Fight comes to an end as Luchist Lasso and Jeanne enter the fray. Later, Yoh reveals a plan to beat Hao.

episodes.name: Humility
episodes.overview: As the Shaman Fight matched enter the final stages, Team Ren faces a fierce battle against The Wisdom Kings, who can nullify a person’s Over Soul.

episodes.name: Encounters in Hell
episodes.overview: Horohoro clinches the win for Team Ren, meaning their next opponent is Team Funbari Hot Springs. Meanwhile, a dubious group approaches Yoh and others.

episodes.name: A Great Trial
episodes.overview: Yoh continues to fight his way through hell with his new ability. As the Shaman Fight gets more complicated, an unprecedented trail awaits Yoh’s team.

episodes.name: The End of a Dream
episodes.overview: Marco and the others desperately resist Hao’s attack to keep Jeanne safe. Hao’s clash with the X-Laws causes an unexpected crisis.

episodes.name: A Leisurely Chat
episodes.overview: Hao’s lackeys begin to doubt his intentions. Anna confronts Hao, who reveals his ultimate oversoul. Yoh’s group steps into the Shaman Fight ring.

episodes.name: The First and the Last
episodes.overview: The Shaman Fight between Team Funbari Hot Springs and Team Ren begins! But before Yoh can launch his counterattack, the match takes and unexpected turn.

episodes.name: True Justice
episodes.overview: Yoh and the others enter the area for the second tournament, but before it can begin, Yoh makes a surprising declaration.

episodes.name: Plants
episodes.overview: The winner of the Shaman Fight will finally be revealed. Yoh and the others try to stop Hao from joining with the Great Spirit.

episodes.name: All The Way
episodes.overview: Yoh and the others are giving it their all, but despite their best efforts and sacrifices, Hao manages to reach the King’s shrine.

episodes.name: Good Night
episodes.overview: Yoh and the others arrive at Patch Officiant Kalim’s residence, where they decide to take a well-earned rest. But soon, a surprise arrives.

episodes.name: Falling Damko
episodes.overview: During the battle against Kalim, the darkness that has been burdening Horohoro finally comes to light.

episodes.name: Last Test: Shaman Fight
episodes.overview: The group finally makes it to the final plant where they face Rutherfor, their most formidable opponent yet.

episodes.name: Shaman King: God End
episodes.overview: Hao releases the might of his newly acquired powers against Yoh and the others, but the scrappy crew refuses to give up hope.
